subject: Basketball

NCAA Basketball Tournament
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Kelvin Sampson’s future as the Indiana coach was in doubt Wednesday after the release of an N.C.A.A. report that said he committed five “major” violations.
snippet: Kelvin Sampson’s future as the Indiana coach was in doubt Wednesday after the release of an N.C.A.A. report that said he committed five “major” violations.
